text: 213 (pronounced two-one-three) was an American West Coast hip hop group with Warren G, Snoop Dogg and Nate Dogg. They were based in Long Beach, California. They performed gangsta rap and G-funk. The group was formed in 1990 and ended in 2011 when Nate Dogg died. ==References== Category:American rap music groups Category:Musical groups from Long Beach, California Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1992 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:Musical groups established in 1990 Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:1990s American music groups
title: 213 (group)
